statements: SELECT * FROM WeatherData ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 20
SELECT * FROM WeatherData ORDER BY humidity ASC
SELECT date, precipitation FROM WeatherData WHERE precipitation > 0.5
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM WeatherData
SELECT * FROM WeatherData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60
SELECT date, precipitation FROM WeatherData WHERE precipitation >= 0.5 ORDER BY date
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity > 50
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(precipitation) FROM WeatherData WHERE date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM weather_records WHERE location='New York'
SELECT location, date, temperature FROM weather_records ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT location, temperature, weather_conditions FROM weather_records WHERE temperature > 80
SELECT date, location, temperature, weather_conditions FROM weather_records WHERE location='London' ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT * FROM climate_trends WHERE trend_analysis LIKE '%global warming%'
SELECT location, date, temperature, weather_conditions FROM weather_records WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM weather_records WHERE location = 'New York' AND temperature < 15 ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_records WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY location DESC, temperature ASC
SELECT location, temperature, weather_conditions FROM weather_records WHERE weather_conditions LIKE '%rain%' ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT location, trend_analysis, trend_start_date FROM climate_trends ORDER BY trend_start_date ASC
SELECT * FROM historical_weather_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM city_weather_data WHERE city_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(precipitation) AS max_precipitation, MIN(temperature) AS min_temperature FROM historical_weather_data;
SELECT * FROM climate_trends WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM city_weather_data;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM historical_weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT city_id, date, temperature FROM city_weather_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY city_id ASC, date DESC
SELECT year, trend_description FROM climate_trends WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 AND trend_description LIKE '%heatwave%' ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_weather_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND precipitation < 2 ORDER BY temperature DESC, date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT date, humidity FROM historical_weather_data WHERE humidity > 70 ORDER BY date ASC, humidity DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 80;
SELECT city, country FROM location_data WHERE city LIKE 'L%';
SELECT * FROM climate_data ORDER BY wind_speed DESC;
SELECT climate_id, weather_condition FROM climate_data WHERE wind_speed < 10;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT city, country FROM location_data WHERE location_id = 1001;
SELECT weather_condition, wind_speed FROM climate_data ORDER BY climate_id DESC;
SELECT trend, factor FROM analysis_data WHERE analysis_id = 5001;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature >= 25 AND humidity <= 70;
SELECT city_name, country, timezone FROM cities;
SELECT city_name, country, timezone FROM cities ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT city_name, country, avg(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM cities INNER JOIN weather_data ON cities.city_id = weather_data.city_id GROUP BY city_name, country;
SELECT city_name, country, date, temperature FROM cities INNER JOIN weather_data ON cities.city_id = weather_data.city_id WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT city_name, country, pattern_name, average_temperature FROM cities JOIN climate_patterns ON cities.city_id = climate_patterns.pattern_id ORDER BY average_temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM cities WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT city_name, temperature, humidity FROM cities JOIN weather_data ON cities.city_id = weather_data.city_id WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70;
SELECT city_name, forecast_text FROM cities JOIN weather_forecast ON cities.city_id = weather_forecast.city_id WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT city_name, average_temperature FROM cities JOIN climate_patterns ON cities.city_name = climate_patterns.pattern_name;
SELECT city_name, trend_name, start_date, end_date FROM cities JOIN climate_trends ON cities.city_id = climate_trends.trend_id WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
